commit.message:
script: fix deprecation warning in makeseeds.py

makeseeds.py:139: DeprecationWarning: please use dns.resolver.resolve() instead
  asn = int([x.to_text() for x in dns.resolver.query('.'.join(

per https://dnspython.readthedocs.io/en/latest/whatsnew.html
dns.resolver.query() was deprecated in dnspython version 2.0.0

verification.payload:
tree fdf47eb370add869f13eaf65e99ded1d4478ae90
parent b6a00e76ab6f9efa1c30b65aa33f8faaf4b50b5b
author Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1604344470 +0100
committer Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1604346897 +0100

script: fix deprecation warning in makeseeds.py

makeseeds.py:139: DeprecationWarning: please use dns.resolver.resolve() instead
  asn = int([x.to_text() for x in dns.resolver.query('.'.join(

per https://dnspython.readthedocs.io/en/latest/whatsnew.html
dns.resolver.query() was deprecated in dnspython version 2.0.0

files.patch:
@@ -135,7 +135,7 @@ def lookup_asn(net, ip):
             ipaddr = res.rstrip('.')            # 2.0.0.1.4.8.6.0.b.0.0.2.0.0.2.3
             prefix = '.origin6'
 
-        asn = int([x.to_text() for x in dns.resolver.query('.'.join(
+        asn = int([x.to_text() for x in dns.resolver.resolve('.'.join(
                    reversed(ipaddr.split('.'))) + prefix + '.asn.cymru.com',
                    'TXT').response.answer][0].split('\"')[1].split(' ')[0])
         return asn

tree 57c9ac2d2784828b5aa13b9cd1869b065dbd19a8
parent dd7b5f46d85401254630abf6976f59b5b8eed181
author Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1604344428 +0100
committer Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1604346899 +0100

doc: update contrib/seeds/README dnspython installation info

files.patch:
@@ -16,6 +16,12 @@ The seeds compiled into the release are created from sipa's DNS seed data, like
 
 ## Dependencies
 
-Ubuntu:
+Ubuntu, Debian:
 
     sudo apt-get install python3-dnspython
+
+and/or for other operating systems:
+
+    pip install dnspython
+
+See https://dnspython.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html for more information.
